metadata.title: CVE-2019-14491 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenCV before 3.4.7 and 4.x before 4.1.1. Thereis an out of bounds read in the functioncv::predictOrdered<cv::HaarEvaluator> inmodules/objdetect/src/cascadedetect.hpp, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
